name: The Cave of Dreams (0.0.1)
description:
Journey through layers of truth, lies, fantasy and reality piecing together a strange trip that you seems to have taken. Several times over.

((This game is 50% 'Choose Your Adventure', 50% armchair philosophy, just as a warning. This might be a vent piece in places. Also, there's a snake involved, sometimes...

It's also my first game that I felt was good enough to post, so there's that. Even it's a bit incomplete. >.>;

Enjoy~))
